data.message: Look, I live in Greece and I never cared about shows and competitions so I do not not know what that list EMIN3M is preparing is...can someone explain what that list is???(I'm sorry if I wrote something wrong, I am tired and I can't think clearly enough to do anything)

replies.message: When artists preform at concerts, they normally prepare a set list (a list of songs in order that the artist will play)
Wait a fucking cursed minute!!!!!EMIN3M is performing at a concert???I didn't have an internet connection for a month and my favorite rapper is performing at a concert!!where??when???
Hahahaha hell yeah bro at a festival in South America! I want to see Eminem as well
South America????fuck my luck!I live in Athens and I am 12, how am I supposed to travel all the way to South America????
